data.title: NHL Draft: Canadian players top 2015 selections
data.meta_description: The 2015 NHL Draft ended Saturday with a total of 211 players picked over seven rounds and Canadian players topped the list of selections once again.
data.text:
The 2015 NHL Draft ended Saturday with a total of 211 players picked over seven rounds and Canadian players topped the list of selections once again.

Canada was well represented in the draft with a total of 79 players picked. The U.S. came in second with 55 players and Sweden rounded out the top-three with 19 players.

With the first overall pick, the Edmonton Oilers selected Connor McDavid and two other Canadians were chosen in the top-five.

Centre Dylan Strome went third overall to the Arizona Coyotes and Mitchell Marner went fourth overall to the Toronto Maple Leafs.

Edmonton was one of the busiest Canadian teams on the second day of the draft, announcing three deals throughout the day.

Here's a look at what each of Canada's seven teams did over the two days of the 2015 NHL Draft:

Calgary Flames

Trade:

2015 1st-round pick, two 2015 2nd-round picks for defenceman Dougie Hamilton (from the Boston Bruins).

Picks:

53rd overall defenceman Rasmus Andersson

​60th overall defenceman Oliver Kylington

136th overall centre Pavel Karnaukhov

166th overall centre Andrew Mangiapane

196th overall defenceman Riley Bruce

Edmonton Oilers

Trades:

2015 1st-round pick and 2nd-round pick for defenceman Griffin Reinhart (from the New York Islanders).

2015 1st-round pick, 3rd-round pick, 7th-round pick for goaltender Cam Talbot (from the New York Rangers).

Defenceman Martin Marincin for 2015 4th-round pick and forward Brad Ross (from the Toronto Maple Leafs)

2015 4th-round pick and centre Travis Ewanyk for defenceman Eric Gryba (from the Ottawa Senators)

Picks:

1st overall centre Connor McDavid

117th overall defenceman Caleb Jones

124th overall defenceman Ethan Bear

154th overall defenceman John Marion

208th overall goaltender Miroslav Svoboda

209th overall defenceman Ziyat Paigin

​Montreal Canadiens

Picks:

26th overall defenceman Noah Juulsen

87th overall centre Lukas Vejdemo

131st overall centre Matthew Bradley

177th overall defenceman Simon Bourque

207th overall left-winger Jeremiah Addison

Ottawa Senators

Trades:

Goaltender Robin Lehner and centre David Legwand for 2015 first-round pick (from the Buffalo Sabres).

Defenceman Eric Gryba for 2015 fourth-round pick and centre Travis Ewanyk (from the Edmonton Oilers).

Picks:

18th overall defenceman Thomas Chabot

21st overall centre Colin White

36th overall right-winger Gabriel Gagne

48th overall centre Filip Chlapik

107th overall defenceman Christian Wolanin

109th overall left-winger Filip Ahl

139th overall defenceman Christian Jaros

199th overall goaltender Joel Daccord

Toronto Maple Leafs

Trade:

2015 fourth-round pick and forward Brad Ross for defenceman Martin Marincin (from the Edmonton Oilers).

Picks:

4th overall centre Mitchell Marner

34th overall defenceman Travis Dermott

​61st overall right-winger Jeremy Bracco

65th overall defenceman Andrew Nielsen

68th overall left-winger Martins Dzierkals

​95th overall defenceman Jesper Lindgren

125th overall left-winger Dmytro Timashov

​155th overall defenceman Stephen Desrocher

185th overall right-winger Nikita Korostelev

Vancouver Canucks

Trade:

Goaltender Eddie Lack for 2015 3rd-round pick and 2016 7th-round pick (from the Carolina Hurricanes).

Picks:

23rd overall right-winger Brock Boeser

66th overall defenceman Guillaume Brisebois

114th overall centre Dmitry Zhukenov

144th overall defenceman Carl Neill

149th overall centre Adam Gaudette

​174th overall right-winger Lukas Jasek

210th overall defenceman Tate Olson

Winnipeg Jets

​Picks:

17th overall left-winger Kyle Connor

25th overall centre John Roslovic

47th overall centre Jansen Harkins

78th overall left-winger Erik Foley

108th overall right-winger Michael Spacek

​168th overall centre Mason Appleton

198th overall defenceman Sami Niku

203rd overall centre Matteo Gennaro

Other notable trades:
